oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design and synthesis of propellane derivatives and oxa-bowls via ring-rearrangement metathesis as a key step
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
GUNTA, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: DIELS-ALDER REACTION
CLOSING METATHESIS
OLEFIN METATHESIS
CLAISEN REARRANGEMENT
CATALYTIC METATHESIS
ANTHRAQUINONE
POLYCYCLICS
allylation
propellane derivatives
quinones
ring-rearrangement metathesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various intricate propellane derivatives and oxa-bowls have been synthesized via a ring-rearrangement metathesis (RRM) as a key step starting from readily accessible starting materials such as p-benzoquinone, 1,4-naphthoquinone and 1,4-anthraquinone.
